hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: The hint stone you have dialed&has been disconnected.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Compass Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

HC (Malon).text: Remember when Ganon was a blue pig?^I remember.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Big Poe Bottle# and #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Potion Bottle# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Saria's Song#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Zora Scale#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Ganon's Tower#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a solitary #Cow#.
